issue.title: [Testing] Add DataFusion test files to arrow-testing repo
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4444](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4444). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Adding DataFusion test CSV and Parquet files to arrow-testing so that all implementations can use them if desired
